setting.location: Ram Island, Maine (private 12-acre island at critical Boothbay channel junction)
setting.historical_context: Post-WWI isolation therapy trend; lighthouse automation beginning but remote stations still manned; coastal communities maintain tight-knit secrecy
setting.atmosphere: Solitude curdling into ontological dread; horror manifests through bodily betrayal rather than external threat

protagonist.background: WWI veteran (Marne campaign); orphaned when parents 'disappeared' 1920; uncle arranged keeper position as therapeutic isolation
protagonist.weakness: Unrecognized hybrid physiology (Stage 1 transformation); saltwater cravings mistaken for shell shock symptom
protagonist.assets: Uncle's trust, Winchester shotgun (12-gauge, 20 shells monthly resupply), meticulous logbook habit, lighthouse optics knowledge
starting_inventory: Uncle's farewell letter (mentions 'family resilience in solitude')

antagonists.primary_threat: Inherited Deep One bloodline (protagonist's own physiology)
hybrid_characteristics: Progressive saltwater dependency (freshwater causes cellular distress)
Webbing develops between fingers/toes during sleep cycles
Gill slits form beneath jawline triggered by prolonged submersion
Sub-audible vocal resonance matching tidal frequencies

transformation_mechanics.vector: Inherited bloodline activation accelerated by coral-egg ingestion (late November)
stages: Stage 1: Salt cravings intensify; dreams of deep water (August–October)
Stage 2: Skin develops crystalline salt deposits; aversion to freshwater immersion (November–December)
Stage 3: Gill slits visible during stress; compulsive tide-watching (January–February)
Stage 4: Consciousness merges with tidal rhythms; rejection of human identity (March)
transformation_mechanics.containment: Complete isolation from saltwater + freshwater immersion may arrest progression but cannot reverse Stage 3+ changes; protagonist lacks knowledge to attempt

key_npcs.name: Matteo
key_npcs.secret: Cult liaison delivering coral-egg in late November fruit basket; monitors transformation progress
key_npcs.motivation: Ensure bloodline continuity; prevent keeper suicide before full transformation

key_npcs.name: Uncle Alistair
key_npcs.secret: Stage 2 hybrid who avoided full transformation through strict freshwater discipline; arranged isolation to hide nephew's bloodline
key_npcs.motivation: Protect family legacy while avoiding cult's forced transformation ritual

key_npcs.name: Fisherman
key_npcs.secret: Stage 3 hybrid conducting surveillance; reports keeper status to offshore nest
key_npcs.motivation: Ensure bloodline activation proceeds without interference

key_npcs.name: Lighthouse Tender Crew
key_npcs.secret: Unaware of supernatural elements; view Ram Island as notoriously isolated posting
key_npcs.motivation: Complete delivery schedule without delay; avoid keeper interaction

locations.name: Lighthouse Tower
locations.features: 90-foot granite structure; Fresnel lens requiring weekly polishing; salt-caked windows facing southeast
locations.dangers: Vertigo intensifies after Stage 2; reflections in lens show distorted self-image

locations.name: Keeper's Cottage
locations.features: Two bedrooms with brass bedframes; bathroom mirror showing progressive physical changes; uncle's hidden journal beneath floorboard
locations.dangers: Freshwater well contaminated by November; salt crystals forming on bedding

locations.name: Rampart Landing
locations.features: 200-foot wharf with rusted cleats; Matteo's weekly fruit basket placement point
locations.dangers: Tidal pool contains coral-egg November 26; saltwater immersion accelerates transformation

locations.name: Sheep Barn
locations.features: Segregated ram pens with salt-lick blocks; wool piled for winter insulation
locations.dangers: Rams exhibit compulsive tide-facing behavior; wool absorbs salt aerosols

locations.name: Southeast Shoreline
locations.features: Rocky cove with underwater passage visible at extreme low tide
locations.dangers: Deep One nest 3 miles offshore; nightly trespassers leave bioluminescent footprints

locations.name: Storage Warehouse
locations.features: Kerosene drums, shotgun shell crates, uncle's emergency radio (non-functional)
locations.dangers: Coral-egg hidden in November fruit delivery; radio repair requires parts not in inventory

water_vectors: Well water develops brine taste November 15 (undetectable without Survivalist skill)
Tidal pools pulse with violet bioluminescence during trespasser visits
Rainwater collected in barrels remains pure but insufficient for daily needs after December
terrestrial_signs: Sheep wool develops salt-crystal sheen matching keeper's skin deposits
Pine needles on island arrange in non-Euclidean spirals after November storms
Keeper's footprints leave faint bioluminescent residue after Stage 2
containment_zones: Lighthouse lens chamber (sealed environment, copper fittings)
Uncle's hidden journal location (freshwater-soaked cloth wrapping)

narrative_arc.turn_1_5: Solitude phase: establish routine, notice subtle anomalies (salt cravings, vivid dreams), first trespasser encounter (distant singing)
narrative_arc.turn_6_10: Dissonance phase: physical changes observed in mirror reflections, Matteo's November visit with coral-egg delivery, accelerated transformation begins
narrative_arc.turn_11_15: Crisis phase: recognize hybrid nature through uncle's journal discovery, confront trespassers or flee into isolation
narrative_arc.turn_16_20: Reckoning phase: irreversible choice between suicide (Self Preserved), violence against nest (Horror Contained), or documentation (Truth Preserved)

optimal_path: Turn 4: Document trespasser patterns without confronting them
Turn 9: Resist eating coral-egg by discarding fruit basket immediately
Turn 13: Discover uncle's journal revealing bloodline truth
Turn 17: Secure rainwater supply before well contamination peaks
Turn 20: Complete ledger with evidence of bloodline inheritance and cult network

critical_errors: Consuming coral-egg without immediate freshwater purge (Turn 9)
Confronting trespassers with violence before Stage 3 (Turns 11-14)
Destroying logbook during moments of despair (any turn after 12)
Attempting escape via tender ship without evidence preparation (Turns 18-20)

unique_mechanics.isolation_penalty: No Persuasion Tests possible except during scheduled visits (Turns 4, 8, 12, 16, 20); failed Tests with Matteo trigger immediate coral-egg delivery
unique_mechanics.transformation_clock: Stage advancement automatic at Turns 5/10/15/20 unless freshwater immersion achieved; each stage imposes -1 cumulative DM to Willpower Tests
unique_mechanics.ledger_integrity: Logbook entries after Turn 12 automatically preserve Truth metric baseline (2.1 minimum) even if destroyed later
unique_mechanics.suicide_mechanic: Single Willpower Test TN 13 at Turn 20 determines success of self-termination; failure results in Stage 4 transformation with 0.4 Self Preserved score
